item.title: [[Echolocation]], Clicks, Calls, and Whistles
item.description: [[Echolocation]], Clicks, Calls, and Whistles [[Orcas]] make clicks, whistles, in a way that a true language is being spoken.

item.title: Orcas Have a [[Bite Force]] of >131 Megapascals
item.description: aliases: Orca Bite Force compared to Great White Orcas Have a [[Bite Force]] of >131 Megapascals In contrast, a Great White is 27.

item.title: Resident Vs. Transient Orcas
item.description: Resident Vs. Transient Orcas Resident and Transient Orcas do not interact with each other. Transient might be considered a separate species, due to culture!
